about_the_game:
To access this OST : Look for the GordianQuest_Soundtrack folder in your Steam library.

The original Gordian Quest score, composed by award-winning film & game composer Roberto Ignis. Contained are 27 tracks in both MP3 and FLAC format.

Roberto has worked as a music composer and sound designer composing and producing music and sound for countless movies, series, animations, TV documentaries, TV commercials and games.

He has worked on titles and franchises like Two Crown, Kurtzzeithelden, Imperator, Pre Mortem, Edengrad, Travels of Wiglington and Wenks, McDonalds and more. Roberto also composed music for movies by the Polish Ministry of Defense. You can find his music in thousands of projects around the world. He works remotely from his studio in Poland.

name: Gordian Quest Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 560 MB available space

short_description: This is additional content for Gordian Quest, but does not include the base game.
